overview: The diary of the life and death of a group of "amoral" young people, who have reached the point of no return and seek something to believe in and to die for. Their behavior brings them to the attention of the State. A discreet surveillance begins. A vigilante group monitors their house, headed by a nameless blonde man.
tagline: A melody of death, a rapture of colors, sweet violence and dreams.
title: Sweet Bunch
